options.attackIndicatorMaxValue.tooltip: Adjust this slider to change the value at which the Attack Indicator will finish charging to on screen. By default this is 2.0, to match CTS.
options.attackIndicatorMinValue.tooltip: Adjust this slider to change the value at which the Attack Indicator will start charging at on screen. By default this is 1.3, to match CTS.
text.config.combatify-items-v3.title: Combatify Items
text.config.combatify-general.title: Combatify
text.config.combatify-general.option.att: Attack Decay
Enabled
Determines whether damage will decay based on percentage when used before the percent for max charge.
Attack Decay Minimum Charge
The minimum charge whereby attack decay will begin to increase damage from.
Attack Decay Maximum Charge
The charge at which attack decay will reach its maximum damage.
Attack Decay Minimum Percentage Base
The minimum percent of damage attack decay will deal for its base.
Note: This will be the percentage dealt up until the Attack Decay Minimum Charge is hit.
Note 2: If the option is enabled for strength to apply to enchants, this will be used in place of the enchantment specific one.
Attack Decay Maximum Percentage Base
The maximum percent of damage attack decay will deal for its base.
Note: This will be the percentage dealt after the Attack Decay Maximum Charge is hit.
Note 2: If the option is enabled for strength to apply to enchants, this will be used in place of the enchantment specific one.
Attack Decay Minimum Percentage Enchantments
The minimum percent of damage attack decay will deal for the enchantment bonus.
Note: This will be the percentage dealt up until the Attack Decay Minimum Charge is hit.
Attack Decay Maximum Percentage Enchantments
The maximum percent of damage attack decay will deal for the enchantment bonus.
Note: This will be the percentage dealt after the Attack Decay Maximum Charge is hit.
Attack Reach Enabled
Determines whether items will have unique attack reach.
text.config.combatify-general.option.aut: Option for servers which will prevent using auto-attack on client.
text.config.combatify-general.option.axe: Determines whether axes will take normal durability when used to attack.
text.config.combatify-general.option.bed: Allows for reach-around block placement like in Bedrock Edition but most specifically matching CTS 8a's implementation of this feature.
Impaling activates in water or rain rather than just on specific entities.
text.config.combatify-general.option.bow: Whether bows will fatigue when held for too long.
text.config.combatify-general.option.can: Whether you can attack before you would normally be allowed.
text.config.combatify-general.option.cha: Whether attacks can go up to 200%.
Note: For abilities that occur on charged attacks, they become on 90% charge if this is disabled
Whether reach is gained on charged attacks.
text.config.combatify-general.option.cre: Whether creative mode increases attack reach.
text.config.combatify-general.option.cri: Whether players can crit while sprinting.
Whether players' crits apply different damage depending on the charge percentage.
The minimum charge by which a critical hit will occur.
The charge by which a critical hit will occur with its full damage, used exclusively with Charged Crits enabled.
The lower multiplier for a critical hit, used exclusively with Charged Crits enabled.
The multiplier for a critical hit without Charged Crits, or a charged critical's damage otherwise.
text.config.combatify-general.option.cts: Whether the KB from CTS will be used instead of 1.9.
Whether momentum from the user will be passed to the projectile in the CTS way or 1.9.
Enables the saturation functionality from CTS.
1. Saturation will naturally be able to exceed food level.
2. Saturation for a given piece of food does not get added to the saturation level.
Instead, the saturation food provides will be the value saturation is set to if it exceeds current saturation.
text.config.combatify-general.option.dis: Whether tridents can be shot out of a dispenser.
text.config.combatify-general.option.fis: Modifies player fist damage, 2 by default, matching 8C.
text.config.combatify-general.option.has: Whether there will be a ten-tick penalty upon missing an attack.
Whether Haste will be altered to account for the 1.5 attack speed decrease.
text.config.combatify-general.option.iFr: Whether the I-Frames an opponent receives will be based on their weapon's attack speed.
text.config.combatify-general.option.mis: Whether missed attacks trigger a 4-tick cooldown instead of requiring 100%.
text.config.combatify-general.option.per: Strength and Weakness work as percentage buffs rather than flat increases.
text.config.combatify-general.option.pro: Determines if projectile damage sources have I-Frames.
text.config.combatify-general.option.res: Attack cooldown resets when changing items.
text.config.combatify-general.option.fas: Allows for fast healing like in 1.9+ when you have high saturation.
text.config.combatify-general.option.sno: Allows damage sources that deal 0 damage to trigger KB.
text.config.combatify-general.option.str: Allows Strength and Weakness to impact the damage gained from enchantments.
text.config.combatify-general.option.swe: Allows any item to sweep given it has sweeping.
text.config.combatify-general.option.tie: Determines whether the attack damage bonus for tiers is nerfed for stone and above.
text.config.combatify-general.option.tri: Allows Tridents with Loyalty to return to you from the void.
text.config.combatify-general.option.shi: Time, in ticks, for which shields will have to be held before being able to protect the user.
text.config.combatify-general.option.sta: Time, in seconds, which it will take to take one health point of damage from starvation.
text.config.combatify-general.option.hea: Time, in seconds, which it will take to regenerate one health point through natural healing.
text.config.combatify-general.option.fas: Time, in seconds, which it will take to regenerate one health point through 1.9 fast healing.
text.config.combatify-general.option.ins: The amount by which the effect of an instantaneous potion will be multiplied by when used as a tipped arrow.
text.config.combatify-general.option.shi: Time, in seconds, which the shield will be disabled for without any modifications.
Angle in degrees to be used by the shield protection arc.
text.config.combatify-general.option.min: Defines the minimum size for entity hitboxes
text.config.combatify-general.option.eat: Defines the mode upon which your eating/drinking will be interrupted when hit.
Full Reset - Eating is reset to the amount of time it started with.
Delay - Eating is interrupted for the amount of ticks you are invulnerable for after an attack.
text.config.combatify-general.option.hea: Defines the mode upon which you will undergo natural regeneration.
Vanilla - Healing relies on saturation as a buffer, rather than just taking hunger.
CTS 8c - Healing has a 50% chance to take hunger.
Combatify - Healing relies on saturation as a buffer until saturation reaches 5, upon which it starts taking hunger each time you heal.
text.config.combatify-general.option.arm: Allows items with Armor Piercing to disable shields.
text.config.combatify-general.option.att: Cooldown Bypass For Max Attack Speed
If disabled and your tool has maxed attack speed (20), will prevent attacks from resetting.
text.config.combatify-general.option.con: Adds Knives and Longswords with their own respective stats and abilities.
text.config.combatify-general.option.tie: Adds Tiered Shields which get stronger per level.
text.config.combatify-general.option.dis: Note: Requires Shield Delay to be non-zero to present any effect.
text.config.combatify-general.option.fis: Fishing Rod deals knockback when hitting an entity.
text.config.combatify-general.option.imp: Makes End Crystals, Paintings, and Item Frames trigger missed attack recovery so 100% charge is not needed to hit again.
text.config.combatify-general.option.let: Option for servers which allows vanilla clients to connect.
text.config.combatify-general.option.mag: Determines if magic damage sources have I-Frames.
text.config.combatify-general.option.mid: Allows knocking players up into the air even if they are already in the air.
text.config.combatify-general.option.mob: Allows mobs to use blocking items in their off-hand while on the ground.
Allows certain mobs that use melee attacks to sprint under certain conditions.
text.config.combatify-general.option.old: Allows you to sprint until your hunger is empty like in CTS 5.
text.config.combatify-general.option.shi: Only allows you to block with a shield during charge.
Note: Does not apply to swords.
text.config.combatify-general.option.swe: Makes Sweeping Edge ineffective against entities you have tamed.
text.config.combatify-general.option.shi: Percentage of charge needed for V5 shield to work.
text.config.combatify-general.option.arr: Defines the mode upon which Arrows will disable shields.
Default - Arrows do not disable shields
Crit - Only critical arrows disable shields
Piercing - Only piercing arrows disable shields
Crit or Piercing - Critical or piercing arrows disable shields
Crit and Piercing - Critical piercing arrows disable shields
text.config.combatify-general.option.arm: Defines the mode upon which armor piercing is activated.
Vanilla - Armor Piercing is applied after armor calcs, and is subtracted from the protection.
Combatify Original - Armor Piercing is applied before armor calcs, and negates a percentage of the armor and toughness.
Combatify New - Armor Piercing is applied after armor calcs, and is taken out as a percentage of the protection.
